entry.title: The Struggle of Tech: Feeling Better as a Learner
entry.summary:
Description

Coding or learning other technical skills for some is a breeze but to others it can be a challenge. In this talk we will explore of few ways that could help us find joy in learning hard things. Starting from re-framing our way of thinking about the challenge, to overcoming the struggle, finding joy in the act of learning and getting out of this process as a better person.
